title: tfw you spend an hour working on a post

replies.body:
Not even F5.

I sometimes missclick, trying to switch tabs and instead end up closing the active one.
ctrl+shit+T
Well, that at least works for threads, but comments-in-progress still get nuked.
I'd love to control my shits for the sake of memeing

When you see it... you'll shit bricks.

I just realized, he indeed wrote "_shit_".
lol...
i love fapping with ketchup too
Rip the Mordekaiser guide I wanted to post -.-
Omg, you were making a morde guide??? I would've loved to read that! Please consider retyping it. Though you don't have to of course, I know how terrible it is to lose a work in progress like that...
Yeah, i really wanted to have it posted by saturday but now I'm just soo tilted by me being so dumb and deleting it...

While I was finishing up the original Shipping Wars voting page, I was trying to type a capitalized letter and somehow pushed ctrl+some combination of keys that highlighted the entire post (basically finished...) and then I hit another letter, which replaced the entire post with "a"... I almost didn't remake the post...
You can rightclick and undo changes man. No remaking involved.

Now you tell me...
https://i.imgflip.com/176u9w.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XtVwxrOT,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-07-10T18:34:20.246+0000)
>
> Now you tell me...
> https://i.imgflip.com/176u9w.gif

Or control-Z (command-z on mac).
Same principle, its the button for undoing stuff.

tfw when you subsequently go for control and then go for z:

"dontclick's'dontclick's'dontclick's'PLEASEHEAVENSDONTLETMECLICK'S'"
Or click off the text box accidentally and then hit backspace.
CTRL + Z
Backspace is the shortcut for going back a webpage in almost every well known desktop browser.
Chrome is about to remove that shortcut

My computer just does strange things on it's own. I will be typing stuff and suddenly will go back into the middle of what I typed, take the word I just typed and move it there, if not delete everything except for what I just typed. The worst is when I type something and it then either backs up to the last page (in this case, it'd be the main boards page) or resets the page I'm on .__.
try cancel instead of post. The salty tears.
This is why I use notepad to draft long posts or comments.
How do you accidentally hit f5? What were you trying to hit?
This is why I compose my longer posts on etherpad.net, then swap to boards to finish up formatting.
Or Rito says wrong section of the boards and deletes it XD

This is why, for those longer, more complicated threads, you should make them in notepad or word first, and then copy paste into the forums.  Makes it that much easier to spell check, edit, save and recover your work.

I worked the last two days on a picture of Leona for a post, but, when I zoomed out and saw the whole picture I felt like puking.
I won't try drawing faces and/or anatomically correct heads ever again
